name: HIRAL Electricals
overview:
Established in the year 1995, we, “HIRAL Electrials” is a successful organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Cabinet Handle, Door Handle, Sofa Leg, Door Kadi and Wall Hook. Under this range, we offer Stylish Lever Cabinet Handle, Kitchen Cabinet Handle, Brass Elegant Cabinet Handle and Stainless Steel Cabinet Handle.

Our Team: Administrative staff Accounting personnel Quality controllers R&D experts

Our Quality: Quality is a very essential factor of our organization and updated technology is of the most important factors of all. In order to manufacture these products, we make sure that each of the products are as per the latest advancement in technology and facility.

Our Infrastructure: We have developed a sophisticated infrastructure unit that is spread across a wide area of land. This manufacturing unit is manned by our team of highly experienced professionals who make use of premium quality raw material for manufacturing our quality products.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client centric firm, we constantly strive hard to provide them with the best quality range of products. These products are precisely manufactured from high quality material to ensure its high quality and optimum performance.

Why Us?: Transparent business policies High quality products Competitive price Utmost client satisfaction

offices.address1: Patel Industrial Area, Plot No. 6/7, N/H 8- B, Ring Road, Behind Railway
